1:
Those who live under the protection of God Almighty,\q2 will be able to rest safely under his care.
\q1
2:
I will declare to Yahweh,\q2 "You protect me;
\q2 you are like a fort in which I am safe.
\q2 You are my God, the one in whom I trust."



\q1
3:
He will rescue you from all hidden traps\q2 and save you from deadly diseases.
\q1
4:
He will shield you as a bird protects her young under her wings.\q2 You will be safe in his care.
\q2 His faithfully doing what he has promised is like a shield that will protect you.


\q1
5:
You will not be afraid of things that happen during the night that could terrorize you\q2 or of arrows that your enemies will shoot at you during the day.
\q1
6:
You will not be afraid of plagues that demons cause when they attack people at night\q2 or of other evil forces that kill people at midday.
\q1
7:
Even if a thousand people fall dead alongside you,\q2 even if ten thousand people are dying around you,
\q2 you will not be harmed.


\q1
8:
Look and see\q2 that wicked people are being punished!
\q1
9:
Yahweh protects me;\q2 trust God Almighty to shelter you, too.


\q1
10:
If you do, nothing evil will happen to you;\q2 no plague will come near your house
\q1
11:
because Yahweh will command his angels\q2 to protect you in whatever you are doing.


\q1
12:
They will hold you up with their hands\q2 so that you will not hurt your foot on a big stone.
\q1
13:
You will be kept safe from being harmed by your enemies;\q2 it will be as though you were killing strong lions and poisonous snakes by stepping on them!



\q1
14:
Yahweh says, "I will rescue those who love me;\q2 I will protect them because they acknowledge that I am Yahweh.
\q1
16: I will reward them by enabling them to live a long time,\q2 and I will save them."
